title: Oxford Uni academics launch a tracker for COVID   policy interventions
description: Oxford University academics have launched a project to track government responses to the coronavirus pandemic  The tool  called the Oxford COVID   Government Response Tracker  OxCGRT  tracks   indicators to generate an index that compares the stringency of
